Name: Save Santa
About the game: Santa Claus needs your help to retrieve all the children's presents that the wicked witch stole and scattered in the shattered wonderland. A land she created with her evil magic and dragged Santa into it, forcing him to pass through all kinds of traps and creatures. Even the animals on this shore were possessed by her spells in such a way that they will do everything possible to prevent our mission to recover the gifts. Hurry up, don't let the witch's magic spread, even more, collect all the presents and destroy the witch's magic. Save Santa, save Christmas!
